title: Chapter 4542 - Chapter 4542: 4541 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Faction 7
body:
Chapter 4542 - Chapter 4542: 4541 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Faction 7

Chapter 4542: 4541 annihilating the evil sequence faction 7

All the experts of the evil sequence faction started to move.

The Lord of disaster and the others used powerful treasures to connect the lifeforce of all the experts together.

Although the overall destructive power had decreased, facing a chaos-level existence and the Dragon Palace Dragon King’s Curse, there was no way they would be instantly killed!

At the same time, they sent a message to the great dao-level experts and control-level experts who had been massacred, telling them to gather immediately!

They mobilized all their strength to fight against the Dragon Palace Dragon King.

They fought against the invasion of the Dragon Palace Alliance.

This result was something they had never expected.

They went to destroy the Dragon Palace Alliance, but they were forced into a desperate situation by the Dragon Palace Dragon King!

A group of experts from the evil sequence faction flew out of the evil sequence universe.

At the same time, the expert who was killed by Wang Xian rushed over quickly.

They were going to surround and annihilate the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace!

“Huh?”

At the same time, when the experts from the evil sequence faction rushed over, Wang Xian had already sensed something.

Such a majestic energy fluctuation was attacking him. It was impossible to avoid his detection.

“Is the decisive battle about to begin?”

Wang Xian sensed the waves of terrifying energy and a smile appeared on his face.

Let’s have a decisive battle then!

With a thought, he continued to curse.

This time, the curse was targeted at the group of powerhouses that he had killed.

There were six Great Dao level powerhouses and more than 20 control level powerhouses.

This was an extremely powerful force.

It was so powerful that when they joined forces, they could easily fend off the divine roc of the Nine Heavens.

Wang Xian wanted to kill it.

This way, the subsequent battles would be smoother!

Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz

The curse force was activated once again.

At this moment, in the surrounding chaotic domain.

In the various universes, after receiving the information, the powerhouses immediately rushed into the evil sequence universe.

As the center of the evil sequence universe, many universes had long-distance teleportation arrays.

They only needed a few teleportation arrays to arrive at the evil sequence universe.

“That Damned Dragon King, now Lord Disaster Master and the others have found a way to deal with you. This time, we will kill you and completely destroy you!”

At a long-distance teleportation array located in the primal chaos.

Spirit kneader walked out from inside and growled with a face full of killing intent.

Hatred had already filled his entire soul.

“Weng Weng!”

“Weng Weng!”

However, at this moment, his eyes were wide open, filled with disbelief and shock.

In order to wait for him to have any more reactions, he directly collapsed there.

In the next moment, his mind recovered in a universe.

This universe was the universe he controlled.

He was the universe master of this universe.

And the center of this planet was the place where he was resurrected.

The Spirit KNEADER’s body sat up from the bed with a trace of fear on his face.

“I was cursed by the Dragon King. I was killed by the Dragon King’s curse again. How did he do it? Will I be killed by the curse again?”

The spirit kneader said in horror.

It wasn’t just him. In the other universes, the Great Dao experts in the illusory realm and other evil sequence universes, as well as the experts in control, were all dying rapidly.

They were all experts who had been cursed to death once.

Now that they were dying again, they all had the same thought.

Would they be cursed to death forever?

If that was the case, they would die completely!

Even so, their losses were still huge!

However, soon, an answer that made them feel extremely terrifying came out!

Not long after they were cursed to death again, death came again!

“That Dragon King can keep cursing us, they can kill us completely!”

The spirit kneader said with a pale face.

He quickly spread the news to the Lord of disaster and the others!

They were masters of the Great Dao.

Even if they were killed once, twice, or thrice, they could be resurrected.

Moreover, the place where they were resurrected was very secretive.

In other words, it was very difficult for them to be killed two or three times by the enemy.

However, the Dragon King could ignore space, distance, and location, and directly kill them with a curse.

This shocked them.

As long as they didn’t curse the Dragon King, they would disappear completely!

“What?”

“A group of Great Dao and control level experts from the illusionary realm sent a message for help. They are being killed by the Dragon King’s curse. They have already been killed twice!”

In the evil sequence universe, a group of experts led by the Lord of disaster were rapidly flying out of the universe.

At this moment, a few primal chaos level existences and a group of Great Dao level experts all received the message from the spirit kneader and his group.

When they saw this message, they felt a chill in their hearts.

“Only by destroying the Dragon King can we save them!”

“We must destroy the Dragon King. Otherwise, we can’t continue to move in this manner forever!”

The Lord of Calamity and the old man with the bamboo hat said with determination.

“There’s no need to wait for the spirit kneader and the rest. They have been killed by the Dragon King’s curse a few times and are now completely crippled. Let’s make our move first!”

Thousand tentacles growled in a low voice that was filled with killing intent!

“Charge!”

“Kill the Dragon King. We must kill the Dragon King!”

The Lord of Calamity and the rest roared. They immediately increased their speed and charged towards the position of Wang Xian.

With their abilities, if they wanted to travel from the center of the universe to the outside of the universe, coupled with the fact that there was a teleportation array in the middle.

They only needed two to three years.

These two to three years were already very short.

However, the spirit kneader and the rest could not wait for another two to three years!

Wang Xian wanted to curse and kill the experts of the Great Dao and control level at an extremely fast speed.

In less than half an hour, all the experts had already been killed by his curse three times!

At this moment, the experts of the spirit kneader’s illusory realm and the rest had already begun to collapse!

“Sir, Save Us, save us. We have already died three times. Our realms have already fallen. If this goes on, we will be completely annihilated!”

“Lord Thousand Tentacles, save me! I’m willing to be under your control for the time being. Save Us!”

“My Lord, you must save us! You must curse na Dragon King!”

Every time they were cursed to death, they would frantically send out messages, requesting disaster master and the others to save them.

However, when disaster master and the others saw these messages, there was nothing they could do.

They were in the evil sequence universe, and there was nothing they could do to stop it.

They could only look at the distress signal of the spirit kneader and the other experts!

“Damn it!”

Their eyes were blood-red, and their auras were boiling. Everywhere they passed, a terrifying ocean of energy was raised!

With the passage of time, the group of experts was cursed to death dozens of times, up to a hundred times.

Began to have strong, completely disappeared in the world!
